00040 std::string TShapeSizeB1::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSizeB1"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSizeB1::~TShapeSizeB1() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00046                              double& result, 
00047                              MsqError& err )
00048 {
00049   const double tau = det(T);
00050   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00055   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00056   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00061                              double& result, 
00062                              MsqError& err )
00063 {
00064   const double tau = det(T);
00065   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00066     return false;
00067   }
00068   
00069   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00070   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(transpose_adj(T));
00071   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00072   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00073   return true;
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00077                                        double& result,
00078                                        MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00079                                        MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   const double tau = det(T);
00082   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00083     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00084     return false;
00085   }
00086   
00087   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00088   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00089   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00090   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00091   
00092   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00093   deriv_wrt_T *= 2 + 2*f;
00094   deriv_wrt_T -= 2 * f/tau * nT * adjt;
00095   
00096   return true;
00097 }
00098 
00099 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00100                                        double& result,
00101                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00102                                        MsqError& err )
00103 {
00104   const double tau = det(T);
00105   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00106     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00107     return false;
00108   }
00109   
00110   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00111   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00112   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00113   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00114   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00115   
00116   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00117   deriv_wrt_T *= (1+f*nT);
00118   deriv_wrt_T -= f * T * transpose(T) * T;
00119   deriv_wrt_T -= f/tau * nadj * adjt;
00120   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00121 
00122   return true;
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00126                                        double& result,
00127                                        MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00128                                        MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00129                                        MsqError& err )
00130 {
00131   const double tau = det(T);
00132   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00133     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00134     return false;
00135   }
00136   
00137   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00138   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00139   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00140   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00141   
00142   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00143   deriv_wrt_T *= 2 + 2*f;
00144   deriv_wrt_T -= 2 * f/tau * nT * adjt;
00145 
00146   set_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -4*f/tau, T, adjt );
00147   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2 + 2*f );
00148   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 6*nT*f*f, adjt );
00149   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -2*nT*f/tau );
00150 
00151   return true;
00152 }
00153 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00154                                        double& result,
00155                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00156                                        MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00157                                        MsqError& err )
00158 {
00159   const double tau = det(T);
00160   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00161     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00162     return false;
00163   }
00164   
00165   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00166   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00167   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00168   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00169   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00170   
00172   const MsqMatrix<3,3> dNadj_dT = 2 * (nT * T - T * transpose(T) * T);
00173   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00174   deriv_wrt_T -= f/tau * nadj * adjt;
00175   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00176   deriv_wrt_T += f * dNadj_dT;
00177  
00178     // calculate negative of 2nd wrt T of (|adj T|^2 / tau^2) (sec 3.2.2)
00179   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second_wrt_T,    f,            T );
00180   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det(    second_wrt_T, -2*f*f*nadj*tau, T );
00181   pluseq_scaled_outer_product(       second_wrt_T,  6*f*f*nadj,     adjt );
00182   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product(   second_wrt_T, -2*f*f     *tau, adjt, dNadj_dT );
00183     // calculate 2nd wrt T of this metric
00184   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2.0 );
00185 
00186   return true;
00187 }
